title: Design and Evaluation of Activity-Based Science Teaching Methods for Students with Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in science and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Customized online educational environment for professionals, focusing on activity-based instructional design evaluation and accessibility considerations for learners with disabilities.

learning_goals: Identify at least three activity-based instructional types suitable for cognitive characteristics of students with learning disabilities and explain implementation strategies
Implement blended learning designs combining small-group collaboration, individual assignments, presentations, and formative assessments in an LMS environment
Develop a three-tier evaluation framework assessing the impact of teaching method diversity and frequency on learning outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
